1252980.name: Diner Bros - Taco Amigos Campaign
1252980.description:
It's Tuesday, what's for dinner? Tacos should hit the spot and Taco Amigos has just opened. Let's try there!

¡Esto es muy emocionante! The restaurant is filling up quickly with identical twins, forgetful buds, and a hungry luchador. A mariachi band is getting in the way and the lunch hour rush is straining the kitchen. It's getting stressful and we need to be really efficient but this time we have help! SOFÍA has offered to chop meat for us and LUCÍA can deliver tequila from the local cantina. Working together, we might actually achieve a three star restaurant! ¡Bienvenido a Taco Amigos!

KEY FEATURES

  • Cook brand new Mexican recipes: burritos, beans, rice, salsa… and of course, tacos!
  • Serve new drinks: soda and tequila
  • Attend to 5 new special customers, including Muertos, Luchador, and Mariachi
  • Expand your restaurant with new kitchen equipment and items
  • Hire helpers: SOFÍA can chop and LUCÍA will help too!
1252980.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 俄语, 韩语, 捷克语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
